5 using namespace Mutation::Thermodynamics;
6 using namespace Catch;

11 TEST_CASE("Harmonic oscillator construction", "[thermo]")
12 {
13  SECTION("No characteristic temperatures")
14  {
15  HarmonicOscillator ho;
16  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 0);
17  }
18 
19  SECTION("One characteristic temperature")
20  {
21  std::vector<double> temps = { 1.0 };
22  HarmonicOscillator ho(temps);
23  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 1);
24  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[0] == 1.0);
25  }
26 
27  SECTION("One characteristic temperature")
28  {
29  std::vector<double> temps = { 1.0, 2.0, 3.0 };
30  HarmonicOscillator ho(temps);
31  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 3);
32  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[0] == 1.0);
33  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[1] == 2.0);
34  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[2] == 3.0);
35  }
36 }
37 
41 TEST_CASE("Harmonic oscillator energy", "[thermo]")
42 {
43  SECTION("No characteristic temperatures")
44  {
45  HarmonicOscillator ho;
46  CHECK(ho.energy(1.0) == 0.0);
47  }
48 
49  SECTION("One characteristic temperature")
50  {
51  std::vector<double> temps = { 1.0 };
52  HarmonicOscillator ho(temps);
53  CHECK(ho.energy(1.0) == Approx(0.581976706869326));
54  }
55 
56  SECTION("One characteristic temperature")
57  {
58  std::vector<double> temps = { 1.0, 2.0, 3.0 };
59  HarmonicOscillator ho(temps);
60  CHECK(ho.energy(1.0) == Approx(1.052199081842426));
61  }
62 }
63 
64 
68 TEST_CASE("Loading harmonic oscillator from database", "[thermo]")
69 {
70  // Create a temporary database
71  Mutation::Utilities::IO::TemporaryFile file(".xml");
72  file << R"(
73  <specieslist>
74  <species name="CO2">
75  <thermodynamics type="RRHO">
76  <vibrational_temperatures units="K">
77  932.109 932.109 1914.081 3373.804
78  </vibrational_temperatures>
79  </thermodynamics>
80  </species>
81  <species name="N2">
82  <thermodynamics type="RRHO">
83  <vibrational_temperatures units="K">
84  3408.464
85  </vibrational_temperatures>
86  </thermodynamics>
87  </species>
88  </specieslist>)";
89  file.close();
90 
91  HarmonicOscillatorDB db(file.filename());
92 
93  auto ho = db.create("CO2");
94  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 4);
95  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[0] == 932.109);
96  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[1] == 932.109);
97  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[2] == 1914.081);
98  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[3] == 3373.804);
99 
100  ho = db.create("N2");
101  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 1);
102  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures()[0] == 3408.464);
103 
104  ho = db.create("test");
105  CHECK(ho.characteristicTemperatures().size() == 0);
106 }
